changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, n.id, p.name AS parent, rel.name AS relationship, c.name AS child, n.inference, n.premise1, n.premise2, n.notes, u.name AS updated_by, n.version FROM agency_network n JOIN agency p ON n.parent = p.id JOIN relationship rel ON n.relationship = rel.id JOIN agency c ON n.child = c.id JOIN agency u ON n.updated_by = u.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON n.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
